bike.description: Demo 7 FSR M5 manipulated alloy, 7" travel, 26" F/R wheel, asymetrical rear triangle, ISCG mount, adj. geometry, 1.5" forged HT, cartridge bearing rear shock mount, rear derailleur protector

components.description: Fox DHX 4.0 coil 8.5x2.375", adjustable rebound, ProPedal, IFP pressure, S:450, M:500, L:550
Marzocchi 66RCV 180mm travel, coil spring, 38mm stanchions, rebound and compression adjust, 20mm thru-axle, alloy 1.5" steerer
1.5" alloy with OS bearings, 7050 lightweight cups
Specialized Demo rise bar, 6066 alloy, 31.8mm, 6 degree up, 9 degree backsweep, 680mm wide
Specialized thin lock on grip, dual density
Truvativ Hussefelt, 170mm w/ Gamut P-30 chain guide
Truvativ Howitzer Team, oversize sealed outboard cartridge bearing, 73mm shell
Specialized bolt-on 135mm, hollow 10mm Cr-Mo axle w/ RD guard
Specialized Chunder 26x2.3", 60TPI, aramid bead, cap ply, soft dual compound
Specialized Chunder 26x2.3", 60TPI, aramid bead, cap ply, soft dual compound
Specialized Enduro, 8mm Cr-Mo rails, SL foam
Alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual
